cause.description:
It's quite simple--we believe that if everyone (yes, EVERYONE) in the world had a good therapist, the world would be a much better, more peaceful place. We know it won't be easy to do, but what word peace attempt is?
1. War could be replaced by group therapy between national leaders.
2. Therapists could control and even end hatred in the world.
3. Mental health is just as important as physical health.
cause.name: World Peace through Getting Everyone Therapy
